register.agreement: By registering, you agree to our <1>Privacy Policy</1>, <2>Terms & Conditions</2> and <3>Acceptable Use Policy</3>.
register.freeRegisterSuccess: You have successfully <1 /> registered to SOCIALHOSE.IO with a <2>Free Basic Account</2>.
register.paidRegisterSuccess: You have successfully paid and <1 /> registered to SOCIALHOSE.IO.
register.successBottomText: Check your email ({{email}}) for a link to activate your account. If it doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.

verification.failed: Sorry, we cannot verify your account.
verification.success: You have successfully verified your email address.

forgotPass.subLabel: Use the form below to recover it.

resetPass.subLabel: Use the form below to reset the password.

commonSection.insightsText: Know your audience and segment them so you can better understand and reach them. Gain insights into consumer habits to better create relevant content.
commonSection.brandText: With our technology, you'll be able to seamlessly manage your brand's online presence and get insights into conversations happening around your brand instantaneously.
commonSection.socialText: Your access to a data from multiple social networks is provided by our Elasticsearch database, making it searchable at all times.

errorMessages.badCredentials: The email or password is incorrect.

messages.forgotPasswordSubmit: Check your email ({{email}}) for a link to reset your password. If it doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
messages.passwordUpdated: You have successfully updated your password.
